basics.name: Sam Poder
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am a dedicated Grade 9 student at GEMS World Academy from Australia but living in Singapore, I'm passionate in Science, Technology and History. I enjoy programming, filmmaking and sport.

highlights: Was Elected by the Students
Drove Change in the Community
Communicated with School Administration
Started a company
Raised over $10,000
Developed Machine Learning Algorithms & Mobile Apps
Inaugural Editor of School Newspaper
Created Innovative & Interactive Digital Experience
Wrote Articles & Managed Team
Created App Idea to Improve Education For Less Fortunate
Presented at an Apple Educators Conference
Participated in 4 Rounds
Developed Debating & Writing Skills as well as Knowledge

Manila Global Round 2019: 13th Best Student (Gold Medal & Trophy), 7th Best Debater (Gold Medal & Trophy), 18th Best Team Overall (Gold Medal & Trophy), 9th Best Team in Debate (Gold Medal & Trophy), 7 Additional Gold Medals & 3 Additional Silver Medals
Singapore Regional Round 2019: 6th Best Individual in Debate (Gold Medal), 3rd Best Team in Debate (Gold Medal & Trophy), 13th Best Overall Team (Gold Medal) & 5 Additional Gold Medals
Participated in 3 Rounds
Consistently placed in the top 10 individually
Consistently placed in the top 3 teams
3x Qualifier for the History Olympiad
Third in my school for the American Maths Competition
School champion of Asian Rockstars of Math for my age group and a Asia Gold Medal Winner
Received a high distinctionÂ award in Australia's 2019 Big Science Competition
My teacher Dr Ong commented &quotSamuel has earned highest honours at external academic competitions and applied his understanding of Science and Technology effectively to his innovations&quot
Grand Champion, Young Founders Summit 2018
Minor Prize Winner, Google Code In

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Chair, ACM Manoa, 2016-Present
Member, IEEE Student Branch, 2014-Present
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
